title: [Medicine] Analysis of vitamin D level among asymptomatic and critically ill COVID-19 patients and its correlation with inflammatory markers. VitD level is low in severe patients (97% vs 33%); inflammatory response is higher in VitD-deficient patients, and so is their fatality rate (21% vs 3.1%) [n=154].
[Medicine] Pfizer is seeking emergency use of its COVID-19 vaccine in the U.S
